title: EO Item
description: STAC Earth Observation (EO) Extension to a STAC Item.  See https://github.com/radiantearth/stac-spec/blob/dev/extensions/stac-eo-spec.md

eo:gsd.title: Ground Sample Distance
eo:gsd.description: Ground Sample distance. The nominal distance between pixel centers available, in meters.

eo:platform.title: Platform
eo:platform.description: Unique name of the specific platform the instrument is attached to. For satellites this would be the name of the satellite (e.g., landsat-8, sentinel-2A), whereas for drones this would be a unique name for the drone.

eo:constellation.title: Constellation
eo:constellation.description: Name of the group or constellation that the platform belongs to.

eo:instrument.title: Instrument
eo:instrument.description: Name of instrument or sensor used (e.g., MODIS, ASTER, OLI, Canon F-1).

eo:bands.title: Bands
eo:bands.description: This is a dictionary of band information where each key in the dictionary is an identifier for the band (e.g., 'B01', 'B02', 'B1', 'B5', 'QA').

common_name.title: Common Name
common_name.description: The name commonly used to refer to the band to make it easier to search for bands across instruments. See list of accepted common names at https://github.com/radiantearth/stac-spec/blob/dev/extensions/stac-eo-spec.md.

gsd.title: Ground Sample Distance
gsd.description: Ground Sample distance. The nominal distance between pixel centers available, in meters.

accuracy.title: Accuracy
accuracy.description: The expected error between the measured location and the true location of a pixel, in meters on the ground.

center_wavelength.title: Center Wavelength
center_wavelength.description: The center wavelength of the band, in microns.

full_width_half_max.title: Full Width Half Max
full_width_half_max.description: Full width at half maximum (FWHM). The width of the band, as measured at half the maximum transmission, in microns.

eo:epsg.title: EPSG
eo:epsg.description: EPSG code of the datasource's projection system.

eo:cloud_cover.title: Cloud Cover
eo:cloud_cover.description: Estimate of cloud cover as a percentage (0-100) of the entire scene. If not available the field should not be provided.

eo:off_nadir.title: Off Nadir
eo:off_nadir.description: Viewing angle. The angle from the sensor between nadir (straight down) and the scene center. Measured in degrees (0-90).

eo:azimuth.title: Azimuth
eo:azimuth.description: Viewing azimuth angle. The angle measured from the sub-satellite point (point on the ground below the platform) between the scene center and true north. Measured clockwise from north in degrees (0-360).

eo:sun_azimuth.title: Sun Azimuth
eo:sun_azimuth.description: Sun azimuth angle. From the scene center point on the ground, this is the angle between truth north and the sun. Measured clockwise in degrees (0-360).

eo:sun_elevation.title: Sun Elevation
eo:sun_elevation.description: Sun elevation angle. The angle from the tangent of the scene center point to the sun. Measured from the horizon in degrees (0-90).
